name: WASD-Rush
description:
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

WASD-Rush is a fast-pace, skillbased Arcade-Game in which you have to survive as 

long as possible by destroying incoming tiles.

------------------------ WASD / Arrow Keys to destroy near tiles ------------------------

If you reach a certain score, you unlock the next difficulty!

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

If you find any bugs please report them!

Thanks for playing!
